allspice.substitute: 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon and 1/2 teaspoon ground cloves
1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1/2 teaspoon ground cloves + pinch of ground nutmeg

almond paste.substitute: 1 3/4 cups ground blanched almonds plus 1 1/2 cups powdered sugar plus 1 egg white plus 1 teaspoon almond extract plus 1/4 teaspoon salt

apple juice.substitute: apple cider, pear cider, or white grape juice

apple pie spice.substitute: 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg, 1/8 teaspoon ground allspice, and either 1/8 teaspoon ground cardamom, ginger or cloves
2 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1 teaspoon ground nutmeg + pinch ground allspice

arrowroot starch.substitute: 2 1/4 teaspoons of either potato starch or rice starch

arugula.substitute: watercress, baby spinach, belgian endive, escarole, radicchio

asparagus.substitute: broccoli, canned hearts of palm, green beans

baking powder.substitute: 1/4 teaspoon baking soda + 1/4 cornstarch + 1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar

baking powder, double acting.substitute: 1/4 teaspoon baking soda and 5/8 teaspoon cream of tartar
1/3 teaspoon baking soda and 1/2 teaspoon cream of tarter
1/3 teaspoon baking soda and 1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar
1/4 teaspoon baking soda and 1/2 cup sour milk, buttermilk, or yogurt (decrease liquid amount called for in recipe by 1/2 cup)
1/4 teaspoon baking soda and 1/2 teaspoon lemon juice or vinegar used with sweet milk to make 1/2 cup (decrease liquid amount called for in recipe by 1/2 cup)
1/4 teaspoon baking soda and 1/4 cup molasses (decrease liquid amount in recipe by 1 to 2 tablespoons)
1 1/2 teaspoons phosphate or tartate baking powder

baking soda (sodium bicarbonate)rule: 1/.substitute: you need to use 2 to 3 times more double-acting baking powder than baking soda. replace acidic liquid ingredient in recipe with non-acidic liquid.

barbecue sauce.substitute: 1 cup ketchup + 1/2 to 1 teaspoon liquid smoke seasoning

beau monde seasoning.substitute: 1/2 teaspoon table salt plus dash of garlic salt, onion salt, and celery salt

beer.substitute: 1 cup water, white grape juice, apple cider or apple juice, diluted peach or apricot syrups. (substitute equal amounts of liquid.)

beer (for soups and stews).substitute: chicken or beef stock, red wine, sake

brandy.substitute: 1 teaspoon brandy extract plus enough water or liquid called for in recipe to make 1/4 cup
water, white grape juice, apple cider or apple juice, diluted peach or apricot syrups. (substitute equal amounts of liquid.)

broth, beef or chicken.substitute: 1 bouillon cube dissolved in 1 cup boiling water
1 teaspoon powdered broth base dissolved in 1 cup boiling water

buttermilk.substitute: 1 tablespoon lemon juice or vinegar + enough milk to equal 1 cup (for baking, let stand for a few minutes before using), plain yogurt, sour cream

buttermilk (sour milk).substitute: 1 cup milk plus 1 tablespoons vinegar (white or cider) or lemon juice (let stand 5 minutes before using)
1 cup milk plus 1 1/2 to 1 3/4 teaspoons cream of tartar
1 cup mild-flavored soy milk, plus 1 tablespoons vinegar (white or cider) or lemon juice (let stand 5 minutes before using)
1 cup plain or low fat yogurt
1 cup water plus 1/4 cup buttermilk powder

butterrule: don't use spreads or low-fat.substitute: 7/8 to 1 cup hydrogenated fat (shortening) and 1/2 teaspoon salt
to reduce fat and calories - applesauce or prune puree for half of the butter in the recipe

cajun spice.substitute: 1/2 teaspoon white pepper, 1/2 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/2 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon ground red pepper, 1/2 teaspoon paprika, and 1/2 teaspoon black pepper

cardamom.substitute: 1/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg or cloves

catsup.substitute: 1 cup tomato sauce, 1/2 cup sugar, and 2 tablespoon vinegar for use in cooking)

cayenne pepper.substitute: chipotle powder, hot paprika, crushed red papper flakes, chili powder

chicken stock base, instant.substitute: 1 cup canned chicken broth1 cup homemade chicken broth or chicken stock

chile pepper (fresh, minced).substitute: 1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, 1 to 3 teaspoon chile paste, 1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon ground cayenne, 3/4 teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes, 1 teaspoon paprika

chile powder.substitute: 1 teaspoon cayenne pepper, 1 to 2 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon chili powder

chili powder.substitute: 1/2 to 1 teaspoon cayenne papper, 1 to 2 teaspoon paprika, 1 teaspoon chile oil

chili sauce.substitute: 1 cup tomato sauce, 1/4 cup brown sugar, 2 tablespoon vinegar, 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon, dash of ground cloves, and dash of allspice

chives, finely chopped.substitute: 2 teaspoons finely chopped green onion tops

chocolate chips, semi-sweet.substitute: 1 ounce unsweetened chocolate plus 1 tablespoon sugar

chocolate chips, semi-sweet chips, melte.substitute: 2 squares unsweetened chocolate, 2 tablespoons shortening, and 1/2 cup sugar

chocolate, bittersweet.substitute: 2 heaping tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder + 1 to 1/3 tablespoon granulated sugar + 1 1/2 teaspoon butter, shortening, or vegetable oil

chocolate, semi-sweet.substitute: 1 ounce unsweetened chocolate and 4 teaspoon sugar

chocolate, semisweet.substitute: 3 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder + 1 to 1/2 tablespoon granulated sugar + 1 1/2 teaspoon butter, shortening, or vegetable oil

chocolate, unsweetened.substitute: 3 tablespoons cocoa powder plus 1 tablespoon butter or margarine
3 tablespoon carob powder plus 2 tablespoons water
3 tablespoon unsweetened cocoa powder + 1 tablespoon butter, shortening, or vegetable oil

cocoa powder, natural unsweetened.substitute: 1 ounce (square) chocolate (decrease fat called for in recipe by 1/2 tablespoon)
3 tablespoon dutch-processed cocoa plus 1/8 teaspoon cream tartar, lemon juice or white vinegar

cocoa, dutch processed.substitute: 3 tablespoons natural unsweetened cocoa powder plus 1/8 teaspoon baking soda
1 ounce unsweetened chocolate plus 1/8 teaspoon baking soda (reduce fat in recipe by 1 tablespoon)

coconut cream, canned.substitute: 1 cup heavy cream or whipping cream

coffee liqueur (3 tablespoon).substitute: 3 tablespoon water + 3/4 teaspoon insant coffee granules, 3 tablespoon cognac, 3 tablespoon rum

coffee, strong brewed.substitute: 2 tablespoons instant espresso powder dissolved in 3 tablespoons hot water

collards.substitute: kale, mature spinach, mustard greens, turnip greens

condensed cream of mushroom soup.substitute: 1 (10.75 ounce can) condensed cream of celery, cream of chicken, or golden mushroom soup.

corn syrup.substitute: 1 cup granulated sugar and 1/4 liquid (use whatever liquid is called for in the recipe)
3/4 cup light corn syrup and 1/4 cup molasses

corn syrup, dark.substitute: honey, 1 1/4 cup packed brown sugar dissolved in 1/4 cup hot water (or liquid from recipe)

corn syrup, light.substitute: honey, 1 1/4 cups granulated sugar dissolved in 1/4 cup hot water (or liquid from recipe); molasses

cornmeal, self-rising.substitute: 7/8 cup plain, 1 1/2 tablespoons baking powder, and 1/2 teaspoon salt

cornmeal, stone ground.substitute: 1 cup regular milled cornmeal, corn grits, polenta, or maize meal

cracker crumbs.substitute: 1 1/4 cup dry bread crumbs, 1 1/2 cup crushed croutons or stuffing cubes, 1 cup panko

cream cheese.substitute: 1 cup plain yogurt, strained overnight in a cheesecloth

cream of tartar.substitute: 1 tablespoon distilled white vinegar or lemon juice (to add acidity to liquids)

cream, half-and-half.substitute: 1/2 cup whole milk, plus 1/2 cup light cream
7/8 cup milk and 1/2 tablespoon butter or margarine
3 tablespoons oil plus enough milk to equal 1 cup
1/2 cup coffee cream plus 1/2 cup milk
1 tablespoon melted unsalted butter + enough whole milk to equal 1 cup, 3/4 cup whole milk + 1/4 cup heavy or whipping cream, 1 cup evaporated milk (for baking)

cream, heavy (36 to 40% fat).substitute: 3/4 cup milk and 1/3 cup butter or margarine (for use in cooking or baking)
equal parts of part skim milk ricotta cheese and nonfat yogurt beaten until smooth (this mixture cannot be heated because of separation)

cream, light.substitute: 3 tablespoon melted unsalted butter + whole milk to equal 1 cup; 1/2 cup heavy or whipping cream plus 1/2 cup whole milk; 1/2 cup evaporated milk + 1/2 cup whole milk

cream, light (18 to 20% fat).substitute: 3/4 cup milk and 3 tablespoons butter or margarine (for use in cooking or baking)

cream, light whipping.substitute: 3/4 cup whole milk + 1/4 cup melted unsalted butter, 1 cup heavy or whipping cream

cream, whipped.substitute: chill a 13 ounce can of evaporated milk for 12 hours. add 1 tablespoon lemon juice. whip until stiff.
beating until stiff, 1/2 cup ice-cold water and 1/2 cup nonfat dry milk. slowly add 1/2 cup sugar while beating. add 2 tablespoons lemon juice (for cooking only)

cream, whipping.substitute: 2/3 cup whole milk + 1/3 cup melted unsalted butter, 2/3 cup evaporated milk

creme fraiche.substitute: combine 1 cup heavy cream and 1 tablespoon plain yogurt. let stand for 6 hours at room temperature
1/2 cup sour cream plus 1/2 cup heavy cream

currants.substitute: 1 cup other dried fruit (cranberries, blueberries, cherries)

dry bread crumbs.substitute: crushed tortilla chips, crushed dry stuffing mix, crushed pretzels, crushed cornflakes, crushed potato chips

egg.substitute: 3 tablespoons and 1 teaspoon thawed frozen egg
2 1/2 tablespoons sifted, dry whole egg powder and 2 1/2 tablespoons warm water
2 yolks (in custards, cream fillings, and similar mixtures)
1/2 teaspoon baking powder, 1 tablespoon vinegar, and 1 tablespoon liquid (in baking)
1 egg in every 3 can be replaced with 1 tablespoon cornstarch in baking
soften 1 tablespoon unflavored gelatin in 3 tablespoons cold water; add 3 teaspoons boiling water; cool and beat until frothy; add to recipe (reduce other liquid by 2 tablespoons)

2 lg whole egg yolks + 1 tablespoon cold water, 3 tablespoon vegetable oil + 1 tablespoon water (for baking), 1 teaspoon cornstarch + 3 tablespoon additional liquid in recipe (for thickening), 3 tablespoon water/milk + 3 tablespoon flour + 1 1/2 teaspoon shortening + 1/2 teaspoon baking powder (for baking)

egg white.substitute: 2 teaspoons sifted, dry egg white powder plus 2 tablespoons lukewarm water

egg white (1 lg).substitute: 2 teaspoon meringue powder + 3 tablespoon water, 1 tablespoon ground flaxseed simmered in 3 tablespoon water

egg yolk.substitute: 2 tablespoons sifted, dry egg yolk powder and 2 teaspoons water

eggplant.substitute: portobello mushroom caps, zucchini, yellow squash

evaporated milk.substitute: 2 1/4 cups whole milk, simmered until reduced to 1 cup

extracts (such ash lemon or peppermint).substitute: 1/4 teaspoon of oil of similar flavor

fish sauce.substitute: 1 teaspoon light soy sauce with salt

flaxseed.substitute: wheat germ, wheat bran, oat bran, butter/margarine/oil (to replace ground flaxseed as fat)

flour, all-purpose.substitute: 1 cup minus 2 tablespoons unsifted all-purpose flour
1/3 cup cornmeal or soybean flour and 2/3 cup all-purpose flour
1/2 cup cornmeal, bran, rice flour, rye flour or whole wheat flour and 1/2 cup all-purpose flour
3/4 cup whole wheat flour or bran flour and 1/4 cup all-purpose flour
1/4 cup soybean flour and 3/4 cup all-purpose flour

flour, all-purpose (for thickening).substitute: 1 1/2 teaspoon cornstarch, arrowroot starch, potato starch, or rice starch
1 1/2 teaspoon whole wheat flour and 1/2 teaspoon all purpose flour

flour, cake.substitute: 1 cup sifted all-purpose flour minus 2 tablespoons sifted all-purpose flour

flour, self-rising.substitute: 1 cup minus 2 tablespoons all-purpose flour plus 1/1/2 teaspoon baking powder and 1/2 teaspoon salt

flour, whole wheat.substitute: substitute whole wheat flour for 1/4 to 1/2 of the white flour called for in a recipe

garam marsala (1 tablespoon).substitute: 1/2 teaspoon ground cumin + 1/2 teaspoon ground coriander + 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom + 1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon + 1/4 teaspoon ground cloves (toast spices just before using)

garlic.substitute: 1/2 to 1 teaspoon garlic salt (reduce amount salt called for in recipe)

garlic (1 clove fresh).substitute: 1/2 to 1 teaspoon minced shallots, 1/8 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon granulated garlic, 1/2 teaspoon garlic salt (omit 1/2 teaspoon salt from recipe)

garlic salt.substitute: 1 medium-size clove or 1/2 teaspoon minced fresh garlic

gelatin, flavored.substitute: 1 tablespoon plain gelatin and 2 cups fruit juice

ginger root, fresh.substitute: 1 tablespoon candied ginger, rinsed and finely chopped

ginger, crystallized.substitute: 2 teaspoon minced fresh ginger + 1/8 to 1/2 teaspoon granulated sugar, 1/8 teaspoon ground ginger

ginger, ground.substitute: 1 tablespoon grated or minced fresh ginger, 1 teaspoon pumpkin pie spice, 1 teaspoon allspice

greek seasoning.substitute: 1 teaspoon dried oregano + 3/4 teaspoon onion powder + 3/4 teaspoon garlic powder + 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper + 1/4 teaspoon dried mint + pinch of cinnamon + pinch of nutmeg

grenadine.substitute: 2 to 3 teaspoon pomegranate juice (reduce liquid and add sugar as necessary), 1 teaspoon raspberry syrup

grouper.substitute: striped bass, cod, catfish, red snapper

haddock.substitute: cod, pollock, blackfish, grouper, red snapper, sea bass

harissa.substitute: chile paste, 1 to 3 teaspoon hot sauce

hearts of palm.substitute: canned or marinated artichoke hearts, cooked asparagus

herbes de provence.substitute: 2 teaspoon dried thyme + 2 teaspoon dried savory + 1 teaspoon dried marjoram + 1 teaspoon dried lavender + 1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary + 1/2 teaspoon fennel seeds + 1 crushed bay leaf

honey.substitute: 1 1/4 cup granulated sugar and 1/4 cup liquid (use liquid called for in recipe)
1 cup light molasses, light or dark corn syrup, light treacle syrup, or maple syrup
1 1/4 cups granulated sugar + 1/4 cup liquid called for in recipe, 1/2 cup granulated sugar + 3/4 cup maple syrup

hot pepper sauce.substitute: 3/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper plus 1 teaspoon vinegar

italian seasoning.substitute: combine 1 teaspoon basil, 1 tablespoon fresh or dried parsley, and 1/2 teaspoon oregano
1 teaspoon dried oregano + 1/2 teaspoon dried basil + 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme

kale.substitute: collard greens, turnip greens, mustard greens, spinach

ketchup.substitute: 1 cup tomato sauce + 1/4 cup granulated sugar + 3 tablespoon apple cider vinegar + 1/2 teaspoon salt + pinch ground cloves, chili sauce, barbecue sauce

lard.substitute: vegetable shortening, 1 cup + 3 tablespoon unsalted butter, bacon fat

leeks (chopped).substitute: chopped green onions or scallions, chopped shallots, chopped sweet or storage onions

lemon grass.substitute: equal amount of grated lemon zest moistened with a bit of fresh lemon juice

lemon peel, dried.substitute: 1 to 2 teaspoons grated fresh lemon peel (zest)

lemon pepper seasoning.substitute: 1/2 teaspoon grated fresh lemon zest + 1/4 teaspoon salt + 1/8 teaspoon ground black pepper

lemon, whole.substitute: 2 tablespoons lemon juice and 2 to 3 teaspoons lemon rind (zest)

lemongrass.substitute: 1 1/2 teaspoon lemon zest + 1/8 minced fresh ginger

lima beans.substitute: green peas, edamame, sugar snap peas, chickpeas, red kidney peas, black-eyed peas, cannellini beans

liquid smoke.substitute: 2 slices bacon, 1 teaspoon canning liquid from canned chipotle peppers, 1/2 teaspoon paprika

maple sugar.substitute: 1 cup maple syrup (reduce liquid in recipe by 1/4 cup)
3/4 cup granulated white sugar plus 1 teaspoon pure maple extract

maple syrup.substitute: combine 2 cups sugar and 1 cup water, bring to clear boil; take off heat; add 1/2 teaspoon maple flavoring

marscapone cheese.substitute: 1/2 cup cream cheese + 1/2 cup sour cream blended until smooth, 3/4 cup cream cheese + 1/4 cup heavy or whipping cream blended until smooth, 1/2 cup ricotta cheese + 1/2 cup heavy or whipping cream blended until smooth

marshmallow creme.substitute: melt 16 ounces of marshmallows and 3 1/2 tablespoons corn syrup in a double broiler

mayonnaise (for use in salads and salad.substitute: 1 cup either yogurt, salad dressing, or sour cream
1 cup cottage cheese pureed in blender

milk, evaporated (whole or skim).substitute: 1 cup regular cream, whipping, or heavy cream

milk, skim.substitute: 4 to 5 tablespoons non-fat dry milk powder and enough water to make one cup, or follow manufacturer's directions
4 teaspoons non-fat dry milk powder and enough water to make 1/4 cup, or follow manufacturer's directions
2 tablespoons evaporated skim milk and 2 tablespoons water

milk, sweetened condensed.substitute: heat the following ingredients until sugar and butter are dissolved: 1/3 cup and 2 tablespoons evaporated milk, 1 cup sugar, 3 tablespoons butter or margarine

milk, whole.substitute: 1 cup reconstituted non-fat dry milk and 2 teaspoon butter or margarine
1/2 cup evaporated milk and 1/2 cup water
1/2 cup condensed milk plus 1/2 cup water
4 tablespoons whole dry milk and 1 cup water, or follow manufacturer's directions
1 cup fruit juice or 1 cup potato water (for use in baking)
1/4 cup non-fat dry milk and 2 teaspoon butter or margarine and 7/8 cup water
1 cup water plus 1 1/2 teaspoon butter in baking
1 cup buttermilk plus 1/2 teaspoon baking soda (decrease baking powder in recipe by 2 teaspoon)
1 cup minus 3 tablespoon fat-free milk + 3 tablespoon melted butter or margarine

molasses.substitute: 1 cup honey, dark corn syrup, maple syrup, brown rice syrup, or barley malt syrup
3/4 cup sugar, increase liquid by 5 tablespoons, decrease baking soda by 1/2 teaspoon, and add 2 teaspoons baking powder to recipe

mushrooms, fresh.substitute: 3 ounces dried mushrooms plus 1 1/2 cups water

mussels.substitute: oysters, soft-shelled or littleneck clams, scallops

mustard greens.substitute: turnip greens, arugula, collard greens, kale

mustard, dijon.substitute: 1 tablespoon dry mustard mixed with 1 teaspoon water, 1 teaspoon white wine vinegar, 1 tablespoon mayonnaise, and a pinch of sugar

napa cabbage.substitute: green or red cabbage, collard greens

nutmeg.substitute: ground mace, ground allspice, ground cinnamon, apple pie spice, pumpkin pie spice

nuts, chopped, ground or whole.substitute: 1 cup similar nuts (your favorite) prepared in the same way
1 cup rolled oats, browned (in baked products)

oat flour.substitute: 1 1/4 cups old-fashioned oatmeal, ground in blender

oil (for sauteing).substitute: 1/4 cup melted margarine, butter, bacon drippings, shortening, or lard

oil, vegetable.substitute: 1/4 cup buttermilk + 1/4 cup well-drained, unsweetened applesauce or baby food prunes (for baking)

okra.substitute: green beans, asparagus, broccoli, 1 tablespoon filé powder or 2 teaspoon cornstarch mixed with 1 tablespoon cold water (for thickening, especially in gumbo)

olive oil.substitute: corn oil, canola oil, peanut oil

onion.substitute: 2 tablespoon dried onion flakes, 1 1/2 to 2 teaspoon onion powder

onion flakes.substitute: 3/4 to 1 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 cup chopped fresh or frozen onion

orange juice, freshly squeezed.substitute: 1 cup other citrus juice (of your choice)

orange peel (zest), fresh.substitute: 2 to 3 tablespoons grated fresh orange peel (zest)

orange, whole.substitute: 6 to 8 tablespoons juice and 2 to 3 tablespoon grated rind (zest)

oregano.substitute: marjoram, thyme, fresh basil, summer savory

oyster sauce.substitute: 2 teaspoon soy sauce or teriyaki sauce + 1 teaspoon canning liquid from canned oysters + pinch of sugar (if using soy sauce)

oysters.substitute: mussels, soft-shell clams, littleneck clams, scallops

parmesan cheese.substitute: pecorino romano cheese, aged asiago cheese

parmesan cheese, grated.substitute: 1/2 cup grated asiago cheese or grated romano cheese

peanut butter.substitute: 1 cup of another nut butter (such as almond or hazelnut butter)

peppers, red bell.substitute: 3 tablespoons fresh red bell pepper, chopped

pimento.substitute: rehydrate 1 tablespoon dried red bell peppers
3 tablespoons fresh red bell pepper, chopped

poultry seasoning.substitute: 1/2 teaspoon ground sage, 1/2 teaspoon dried thyme, and 1/2 teaspoon dried rosemary
3/4 teaspoon dried thyme + 1/2 teaspoon crushed or rubbed sage + 1/2 teaspoon dried marjoram + 1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper

pumpkin pie spice.substitute: 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ginger, 1/8 teaspoon allspice, and 1/8 teaspoon nutmeg

queso fresco.substitute: feta cheese (rinsed to remove some salt)

raisins.substitute: 1 cup dried blueberries, cranberries, or cherries
1 cup other dried fruit (chopped into small pieces)
other dried fruits like apricots, blueberries, cranberries, or cherries

red cabbage.substitute: green cabbage, brussels sprouts, napa cabbage

rice (3 cups cooked).substitute: 1 cup bulgur or pearl barley, cooked

ricotta cheese.substitute: puréed cottage cheese, fromage blanc, mashed firm tofu

rum.substitute: 1 tablespoon rum extract plus enough liquid to make 1/4 cup

sage.substitute: 3 to 4 teaspoon summer savory thyme, basil, or oregano; 1 tablespoon rosemary; 1 to 2 teaspoon poultry seasoning

salami.substitute: pepperoni, spanish chorizo, prosciutto, summer sausage

savory.substitute: 2 to 3 teaspoon chopped thyme or rosemary, 1 to 1 1/2 teaspoon thyme + 1 to 1/2 teaspoon mint, 1 to 2 teaspoon sage, 1 teaspoon herbes de provence

scallion.substitute: 1 bunch green onions, 3 to 4 cups chopped leeks

sesame oil, toasted.substitute: 2 teaspoon crushed and toasted sesame seeds + 1 teaspoon peanut oil

sesame seeds.substitute: white or black poppy seeds; finely chopped peanuts, almonds, or cashews

shallot.substitute: 1/4 cup chopped leeks or red onions + 1/2 teaspoon minced garlic; 1/4 cup chopped green onions or scallions (white and light green parts only)

sherry.substitute: sake, port, dry white wine + pinch of sugar

shortening, melted.substitute: 1 cup cooking oil (cooking oil should not be substituted if recipe does not call formelted shortening)

sorghum molasses.substitute: light or dark corn syrup, honey, pure maple syrup

sour cream.substitute: plain yogurt, 1/3 melted unsalted butter + 3/4 cup milk + 1 teaspoon lemon juice (for baking)

sour cream, cultured.substitute: 3/4 cup sour milk and 1/3 cup butter or margarine
3/4 cup buttermilk and 1/3 cup butter or margarine
blend until smooth: 1/3 cup buttermilk, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, and 1 cup cottage cheese
3/4 cup milk, 3/4 teaspoon lemon juice, and 1/3 cup butter or margarine

soy sauce.substitute: scant 3/4 teaspoon kosher salt + 1/2 teaspoon granulated sugar dissolved in 1 tablespoon hot water, teriyaki sauce

spinach.substitute: beet greens, turnip greens, kale, arugula, watercess

stock, beef.substitute: 1 cup boiling water + 1 beef bouillon cube, 1 cup canned beef broth, 1 cup red wine or beer (can replace up to half of beef stock in sauce and stews)

stock, chicken.substitute: 1 cup boiling water + 1 chicken bouillon cube, 1 cup canned chicken broth

stock, vegetable.substitute: 1 cup boiling water + 1 vegetable bouillon cube, 1 cup canned vegetable broth

sugar, brown (light or dark).substitute: 1 cup granulated sugar plus 1/4 cup unsulpured molasses

sugar, confectioner's.substitute: 1/2 cup +  1 1/2 tablespoon granulated sugar + 3/4 teaspoon cornstarch, fine ground in blender or food processor

sugar, dark brown.substitute: 1 cup granulated sugar + 2 to 3 tablespoon molasses

sugar, light brown.substitute: 1 cup granulated sugar + 1 to 2 tablespoon molasses, 1/2 cup dark brown sugar + 1/2 cup granulated sugar

sugar, superfine.substitute: 1 cup granulated white sugar processed in a food processor or grinder

sugar, white.substitute: 1 cup corn syrup, decrease liquid called for in recipe by 1/4 cup (never replace more than 1/2 cup sugar called for in recipe with corn syrup)
1 1/3 cup molasses (decrease liquid called for in recipe by 1/3 cup)
1 cup brown sugar (light or dark), firmly packed
1 cup honey (decrease liquid called for in recipe by 1/4 cup)

summer sausage.substitute: salami or other dry sausage, pepperoni, bologna

sweetened condensed milk.substitute: 1 cup evaporated milk + 1 1/4 cups granulated sugar, heated until sugar dissolves

taco seasoning.substitute: 2 teaspoon pure chile powder + 1/4 teaspoon dried oregano + 1/4 teaspoon ground cumin + 1/8 teaspoon garlic powder + 1/8 teaspoon onion powder + pinch of cayenne pepper + salt to taste

tahini.substitute: 3/4 cup peanut butter + 1/4 cup untoasted sesame oil

teriyaki sauce.substitute: 1/3 cup soy sauce + 3 tablespoon rice vinegar + 3 teaspoon sugar or honey

tilapia.substitute: red snapper, orange roughy, sole, flounder

tomato juice.substitute: 1/2 cup tomato sauce and 1/2 cup water
1/2 cup tomato purée or tomato sauce + 1/2 cup water, 1/4 cup tomato paste + 3/4 cup water

tomato paste.substitute: 2 to 3 tablespoon tomato purée or tomato sauce, boil until reduced to 1 tablespoon

tomato purée.substitute: 1/3 cup tomato paste + 2/3 cup water, tomato sauce

tomato sauce.substitute: 3/4 cup tomato paste plus 1 cup water
1/2 cup tomato paste + 1/2 cup water, 1 cup canned stewed tomatoes, blended until smooth

tomato soup.substitute: 1 cup tomato sauce plus 1/4 oz. can cup water

tomatoes.substitute: 1 1/2 cups canned whole tomatoes, 3 tablespoon tomato paste (to replace cooked tomatoes)

tomatoes, canned.substitute: 1 1/3 cups diced fresh tomatoes simmered 10 minutes

tomatoes, packed.substitute: 1/2 cup tomato sauce plus 1/2 cup water

treacle.substitute: 1 cup light or dark brown sugar

turmeric.substitute: 1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger + 1 to 2 teaspoon minced fresh ginger, 5 to 7 saffron threads, 1/2 teaspoon curry powder

turnip greens.substitute: mustard greens, collards, kale, mature spinach

vanilla extract, pure.substitute: 1/2 to 1 teaspoon other extract (such as almond, peppermint, lemon, orange, etc.)

vegetable shortening.substitute: 1 cup + 2 tablespoon unsalted butter (baking), 1 cup bacon fat (sautéing and frying)

vinegar.substitute: lemon juice or lime juice (for dressings, marinades, sauces, and deglazing pans)

vinegar, balsamic.substitute: 1 tablespoon sherry vinegar or cider vinegar

wasabi.substitute: 1 tablespoon well-drained prepared horseradish, 1 tablespoon mustard powder + 1 teaspoon water (mix, cover, and let rest for 15 minutes)

whipped cream.substitute: 12 oz can evaporated milk, chilled overnight, mixed with 1 tablespoon lemon juice, whipped until stiff, beat in 1 teaspoon vanilla extract and 1/4 cup confectioner's sugar

whiting.substitute: cod, flounder, ocean perch, red snapper

wine, red.substitute: 3/4 cup red grape juice + 2 tablespoon red wine vinegar or lemon juice + 2 tablespoon water (for marinades), beef stock (for sauces and stews)

wine, white.substitute: 3/4 cup white grape juice, apple juice, or apple cider + 1/4 cup white wine vinegar or lemon juice (for marinades), sherry or vermouth, sake, chicken or vegetable stock (for sauce and stews)

worcestershire sauce.substitute: 2 teaspoon soy sauce + 4 drops hot pepper sauce + 1/4 lemon juice + 1/4 teaspoon granulated sugar

yeast, active dry.substitute: 1 tablespoon instant or fast-rising active yeast

yogurt.substitute: sour cream, crème fraîche, silken tofu (blended), mayonnaise

yogurt, plain.substitute: 1 cup cottage cheese blended until smooth
